Name: congenital adrenal insufficiency
Definition: An adrenal gland disease that is characterized by cortisol deficiency

Name: corticosteroid-binding globulin deficiency
Definition: An adrenal gland disease characterized by decreased levels of serum corticosteroid-binding globulin and cortisol

Name: medulloadrenal hyperfunction
Definition: An adrenal gland hyperfunction that is caused by overactivity of the adrenal cortex caused by a tumor of the pituitary gland.

Name: obsolete acquired factor IX deficiency
Definition: An adrenal gland hyperfunction that is caused by overactivity of the adrenal cortex caused by a tumor of the pituitary gland.

Name: adrenal cortex disease
Definition: An adrenal cancer that is located_in the cortex (steroid hormone-producing tissue) of the adrenal gland and that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives_from epithelial cells.

Name: adrenal gland cancer
Definition: An endocrine gland cancer located_in the adrenal glands which are located above the kidneys.

Name: adrenal adenoma
Definition: An endocrine organ benign neoplasm that is a benign tumor of the glandular type (adenoma) in the adrenal gland.

Name: Waterhouse-Friderichsen syndrome
Definition: An adrenal gland disease that is characterized by failure of the adrenal gland due to bleeding into the gland.
